article_title: Philips Hit By Fresh Compensation Claim
article_text:
AMSTERDAM—Royal Philips NV said on Thursday that it is facing a claim of €312 million ($394 million) from Japan's Funai Electric Co. amid a dispute between the two electronics giants over a collapsed deal.

Philips agreed to sell its audio and video division to Funai in January 2013 for €150 million, but the deal fell apart later that year. The...

article_metadata.article.origheadline: Philips Hit By Fresh Compensation Claim

article_summary:
AMSTERDAM—Royal Philips NV said on Thursday that it is facing a claim of €312 million ($394 million) from Japan's Funai Electric Co. amid a dispute between the two electronics giants over a collapsed deal.
Philips agreed to sell its audio and video division to Funai in January 2013 for €150 million, but the deal fell apart later that year.
